reviewText: like all his shows. good as always.

I think the series is quite entertaining, but this "best of" DVD is rather pointless and - worse yet - tries to pass itself off as something it isn't. This gets 1 star because the season sets - which are available for under $20 at Amazon.com currently - are what I'd recommend instead.

Forget all the paint, glitter and howling. This family is so mentally healthy. I would recommend any parent and teen to spend some time with the Simmons family for an example of how happy people work together. They have fun, good times and bad, and still demonstrate respect and love each for the other. Unusual to see these days. I'd love to be their neighbor.
Love Gene Simmons and his family.  Great DVD and such a good price.  Good quality and I recommend you buy them all.

I had already seen most of these episodes, but it's nice to have the actual collection to watch over and over.  I just can't wait for #3.  I think if you liked the first, then you will definitely like this second installment.

Being a big fan of KISS, it is awesome to see the life of my idol unfold in front of T.V. cameras. The best of DVD allows new comers to see why this show ROCKS!!!!!! I am sure that after watching this show you will know why Gene says it is good to be him.
The DVD is GREAT...Best Show Ever...The DVD arrived on time and in great condition...***** stars from me :)
